data.title: Index: Fiction, by author
data.meta_description: Check out the index from my old book blog for titles reviewed before 21 October 2012. If I have reviewed five or more books by the same author, I have created a separate page for that author's works; click on the author's name to go to that page. Aarsen, Carolyne Cattleman's Courtship Close to Home …
data.text:
Check out the index from my old book blog for titles reviewed before 21 October 2012.

If I have reviewed five or more books by the same author, I have created a separate page for that author’s works; click on the author’s name to go to that page.
